content:
Craft an item of type: birch_button
inventory=[{"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 26, "index": 11}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 51, "index": 29}, {"type": "emerald_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 34}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a birch button, I need to place birch planks in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the birch planks from slot 42 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: birch_button
inventory=[{"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 26, "index": 11}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 51, "index": 29}, {"type": "emerald_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 34}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 44}]
thought: After crafting the birch button, I need to move it from the crafting grid to my inventory. Therefore, I will move it from slot 0 to slot 12.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
